insert_persona: INSERT INTO persona (nom_persona, apellido_perso) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_persona
insert_username: INSERT INTO usuario (nom_usu, correo_usu, contra_usu, id_persona) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)
getAllUsers: SELECT nombre_usu as usuario FROM usuario
verifyUser: SELECT DISTINCT id_usuario as userId, nom_usu AS username, correo_usu as email FROM usuario WHERE LOWER(nom_usu) = LOWER($1)
verifyPassword: SELECT contra_usu as password FROM usuario WHERE nom_usu = $1
createNote: INSERT INTO nota (titu_nota, conte_nota, id_usuario, id_categoria, favorito) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5) RETURNING id_nota
updateNote: UPDATE nota SET titu_nota = $1, conte_nota = $2, id_categoria = $3, favorito = $4 WHERE id_nota = $5
verifyOwner: SELECT id_usuario AS owner FROM nota WHERE id_nota = $1
